item.title: UPDATE: Special Marine Warning issued for Sarasota and Gulf waters as storm threatens waterspouts
item.description: Waterspouts can quickly form and capsize boats, damage vessels, and create suddenly higher waves.

item.title: Cracker Barrel makes major decision on store remodels after customer feedback
item.description: Cracker Barrel is tabling plans to remodel its restaurants after it received backlash over a new logo.

item.title: Peak of hurricane season is Wednesday
item.description: It has been unusually inactive during the past couple of weeks in the tropics but that can change quickly.

item.title: Alyssa Eurice living her dreams and overcoming all odds despite having four heart surgeries
item.description: This week’s ABC7 Athlete of the Week is Alyssa Eurice. She’s a senior and one of the star volleyball players of the Bradenton Christian School (BCS) Lady Panthers.

item.title: Fire caused by lightning destroys barn in Charlotte County
item.description: No people were inside, but one dog died in the blaze, while another escaped safely.

item.title: Flight attendant in 2024 Naples jet crash says crew communication ‘terrible’
item.description: The flight attendant on board said the interaction between the flight crew was concerning.
